data.title: Cars For Sale in Wayland Used Car Dealers
data.meta_description: Visit our Used Car Dealership in Wayland - We have a great selection of cars, trucks, and SUVs. Also, Online with HD images, Detiails, & Prices. Call (269) 397-2400
data.text:
ABOUT BMG

At Broadmoor Motors, our mission is to provide you with a refreshingly stress-free journey as you explore the perfect vehicle for your needs. Leave behind the tired clichés of greasy sales tactics and high-pressure environments; with us, it's all about guiding you toward your ideal car, no strings attached.

Our approach is the total opposite of the ordinary. With each interaction, whether you're a first-time guest or a familiar face, we aim to welcome you into our BMG family. It's not just about selling cars; it's about fostering a sense of belonging and trust.

When you choose a used vehicle from Broadmoor Motors, you're not just getting a car – you're gaining peace of mind. Every vehicle comes with a 30-day warranty or AS-IS option. Either way, transparency is our commitment to you, as well as providing you with the knowledge you need to make a well-informed decision. No hidden surprises, just the confidence that comes from being in the know.

Visit one of our 3 locations to experience the difference for yourself!

CONTACT US

Broadmoor Motors Wayland

159 N Main St

Wayland, MI 49348

(269) 397-2400

Visit us at these times
